languages.text: When the character deals {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, they also inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} on targets for (damage dealt / 5)% of this damage. This effect does not stack, only bleeding from the highest critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} will remain. Bleeding: this creature is bleeding and suffers damage at the start of its turn. The effect can be removed by any source of healing.
languages.original_text: Нанося {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критический урон{/g}, персонаж также накладывает на цель {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g}, которое наносит (нанесенный урон / 5)% от этого урона. Эффект не суммируется. На цели остается только эффект от {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g}, которое нанесло самый больший урон. Кровотечение: персонаж страдает от потери крови и получает урон в начале своего хода. Эффект можно снять с помощью лечения.

traits.locale_text: When the character deals critical damage, they also make targets bleeding for (damage dealt / 2)% of the this damage. This effect does not stack, only bleeding from the highest critical hit will remain. Bleeding: This creature is bleeding and suffers damage at the start of its turn. The effect can be removed by any medication.

When the character deals critical damage, they also inflict bleeding on targets for (damage dealt / 2)% of this damage. This effect does not stack, only bleeding from the highest critical hit will remain. Bleeding: this creature is bleeding and suffers damage at the start of its turn. The effect can be removed by any source of healing.

When the character deals {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, they also inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} on targets for (damage dealt / 5)% of this damage. This effect does not stack, only bleeding from the highest critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} will remain. Bleeding: this creature is bleeding and suffers damage at the start of its turn. The effect can be removed by any source of healing.

When the character deals {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, they also inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} on targets for (damage dealt / 5)% of this damage. This effect does not stack, only bleeding from the highest critical {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hit{/g} will remain. Bleeding: this creature is bleeding and suffers damage at the start of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The effect can be removed by any source of healing.

languages.text: Cuando el personaje inflige {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g}, también inflige {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} a los objetivos por valor del ({g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} infligido / 5) % del daño. Este efecto no es acumulativo y solo se aplica la hemorragia del {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} crítico más poderoso. Hemorragia: esta criatura sangra y sufre daño al principio de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Este efecto se puede eliminar con cualquier tipo de curación.
languages.original_text: When the character deals {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, they also inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} on targets for ({g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt / 5)% of this damage. This effect does not stack, only bleeding from the highest critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} will remain. Bleeding: this creature is bleeding and suffers damage at the start of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The effect can be removed by any source of healing.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el personaje inflige {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g}, también inflige {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} a los objetivos por valor del (daño infligido / 2) % del daño. Este efecto no es acumulativo y solo se aplica la hemorragia del {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} crítico más poderoso. Hemorragia: esta criatura sangra y sufre daño al principio de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Este efecto se puede eliminar con cualquier tipo de curación.

languages.text: このキャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}を与えた時、さらに対象にこのダメージの(与{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}/5)%の{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}を付与する。この効果は累積せず、最もクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}の高い出血だけが残る。 出血：この生物は出血しており、{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時にダメージを受ける。この効果はあらゆる回復手段で解除できる。
languages.original_text: When the character deals {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, they also inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} on targets for ({g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt / 5)% of this damage. This effect does not stack, only bleeding from the highest critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} will remain. Bleeding: this creature is bleeding and suffers damage at the start of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The effect can be removed by any source of healing.

traits.locale_text: このキャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}を与えた時、さらに対象にこのダメージの(与ダメージ/2)%の{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}を付与する。この効果は累積せず、最もクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}の高い出血だけが残る。 出血：この生物は出血しており、{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時にダメージを受ける。この効果はあらゆる回復手段で解除できる。

languages.text: 当角色造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}时，还会对目标造成{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}效果，流血{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}为此次伤害的（伤害值/5）%。此效果不会叠加，只有伤害最高的那次暴击造成的流血效果会生效。{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g} 流血：该生物在{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时会受到流血伤害。此效果可以被任何治疗效果移除。
languages.original_text: When the character deals {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, they also inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} on targets for ({g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt / 5)% of this damage. This effect does not stack, only bleeding from the highest critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} will remain. Bleeding: this creature is bleeding and suffers damage at the start of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The effect can be removed by any source of healing.

traits.locale_text: 当角色造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}时，还会对目标造成{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}效果，流血伤害为此次伤害的（伤害值/2）%。此效果不会叠加，只有伤害最高的那次{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}暴击{/g}造成的流血效果会生效。 流血：该生物在{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时会受到流血伤害。此效果可以被任何治疗效果移除。

languages.text: Wenn der Charakter {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Schaden{/g} verursacht, fügt er dem Ziel außerdem {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} für (zugefügter Schaden / 5) % dieses Schadens zu. Dieser Effekt wird nicht aufaddiert, mit Ausnahme der Blutung des höchsten kritischen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffers{/g}. Blutung: Diese Kreatur blutet und erleidet zu Beginn ihres Zugs Schaden. Der Effekt kann durch eine beliebige Heilung entfernt werden.
languages.original_text: When the character deals {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, they also inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} on targets for (damage dealt / 5)% of this damage. This effect does not stack, only bleeding from the highest critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} will remain. Bleeding: this creature is bleeding and suffers damage at the start of its turn. The effect can be removed by any source of healing.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Charakter {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Schaden{/g} verursacht, fügt er dem Ziel außerdem {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} für (zugefügter Schaden / 2)% dieses Schadens zu. Dieser Effekt wird nicht aufaddiert, mit Ausnahme der Blutung des höchsten kritischen {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffers{/g}. Blutung: Diese Kreatur blutet und erleidet zu Beginn ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} Schaden. Der Effekt kann durch eine beliebige Heilung entfernt werden.

languages.text: Lorsque le personnage inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g}, il inflige également l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} aux cibles, à hauteur de ({g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés / 5) % de ces dégâts. Cet effet n'est pas cumulable, seul le saignement du {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} critique le plus élevé est conservé. Saignement : la créature saigne et subit des dégâts au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. N'importe quelle source de soins peut permettre de dissiper cet effet.
languages.original_text: When the character deals {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, they also inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} on targets for ({g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt / 5)% of this damage. This effect does not stack, only bleeding from the highest critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} will remain. Bleeding: this creature is bleeding and suffers damage at the start of its {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The effect can be removed by any source of healing.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque le personnage inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g}, il inflige également l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} aux cibles, à hauteur de (dégâts infligés / 2) % de ces dégâts. Cet effet n'est pas cumulable, seul le saignement du {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} critique le plus élevé est conservé. Saignement : la créature saigne et subit des dégâts au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. N'importe quelle source de soins peut permettre de dissiper cet effet.

Эффект не суммируется. На цели остается только эффект от {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g}, которое нанесло самый больший урон. Кровотечение: персонаж страдает от потери крови и получает урон в начале своего хода. Эффект можно снять с помощью лечения.
